price: Bityo (yewe Muhamadi), birengagize kandi (unabibutse) umunsi umuhamagazi azahamagarira kugana ku kintu kibi cyane (gucirwa urubanza ku munsi w’imperuka),
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
